subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Iraq Bombings Kill 127, Dozens More Injured
body:
A parked car bomb detonated in a crowd of workers at a Shiite marketplace in 
Baghdad on Wednesday, killing at least 82 people, police and hospital 
officials said. The attack was one of four bombings in Baghdad on Wednesday 
afternoon, which killed at least 127 people in total, officials said.



Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
